thread.section_title: The Paper Factory Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Long Island City, New York) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: really cool place
thread.title_full: really cool place - Review of The Paper Factory Hotel, Long Island City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Anna G
title: really cool place
text: My husband and I just needed a one night stay in Long island city, and that very night I was able to book without any problems. When I called the hotel and informed them that we'd be arriving after check in hours, they were so pleasant and assured me that someone would greet us when we arrived. The main level of the hotel is so charming, very rustic-industrial. Our room was very clean and neat. The night was very quiet as well. Great stay, we wished we had stayed longer.
